WHY_ME.TITLE: Why me
WHY_ME.ABOUT_ME2: As a junior developer, I bring fresh perspectives, initiative, and a strong work ethic to every project. I don’t just write code — I think ahead and focus on finding effective solutions
WHY_ME.TEXT2: I am open to work remote...|

MY_SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
MY_SKILLS.PARAG2: I strive to continuously develop as a professional by mastering new technologies and tools that enable me to create more efficient and modern solutions. I am passionate about implementing innovative approaches in my work, exploring unconventional solutions, and actively sharing knowledge with the team.
